items.name: San Pedro Square Market
items.short_description: Dive into a lively food hall experience with diverse culinary options, live music, and a bustling atmosphere perfect for any time of day.

items.name: Miniboss Arcade Bar
items.short_description: Relive your childhood with classic arcade games and enjoy a unique cocktail menu in a vibrant, neon-lit retro setting.

items.name: Bill's Cafe
items.short_description: Indulge in hearty, classic American breakfast and brunch dishes in a cozy, family-friendly atmosphere known for its vibrant decor.

items.name: The Boiling Crab
items.short_description: Get ready for a deliciously messy seafood boil experience with fresh catches and signature sauces that tantalize your taste buds.

items.name: Japantown
items.short_description: Explore one of the last three historic Japantowns in the US, known for its vibrant murals, unique shops, and cultural heritage.

items.name: Santana Row
items.short_description: Stroll through this upscale, European-inspired neighborhood brimming with high-end boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and lush landscaping.

items.name: SoFA District (South First Area)
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in San Jose's artistic hub, featuring dynamic street art, eclectic galleries, and lively entertainment venues.

items.name: Mayfair Neighborhood & Mexican Heritage Plaza
items.short_description: Discover vibrant murals, cultural events, and a strong sense of community, anchored by the iconic School of Arts and Culture at Mexican Heritage Plaza.

items.name: Christmas in the Park
items.short_description: Experience the magic of the holidays with dazzling light displays, festive trees, and an enchanting winter wonderland downtown.
items.location_hint: Plaza de Cesar Chavez, Downtown San Jose

items.name: San Jose Jazz Summer Fest
items.short_description: Groove to world-class jazz, blues, and Latin music across multiple stages, transforming downtown into a vibrant celebration of sound.

items.name: Cinco de Mayo Festival San Jose
items.short_description: Celebrate Mexican culture with vibrant parades, traditional music, dance performances, and delicious food in a lively community gathering.

items.name: Vietnamese Cultural Garden Tet Festival
items.short_description: Welcome the Lunar New Year with colorful traditional performances, delicious food, and cultural displays at the Vietnamese Cultural Garden.
items.location_hint: Vietnamese Cultural Garden, East San Jose

items.name: Japantown Peace Plaza Sand Garden
items.short_description: Find tranquility in this meticulously raked Zen rock and sand garden, offering a peaceful, contemplative 'desert-like' landscape in the heart of the city.

items.name: San Jose Aquatic Center Beach Volleyball Courts
items.short_description: Experience a slice of the 'beach' with expansive, well-maintained sand volleyball courts, perfect for a sunny day of play and sandy fun.

items.name: Children's Discovery Museum Sand Exploration Zone
items.short_description: Let your imagination run wild in the museum's outdoor sand exploration area, a creative 'dune-like' landscape designed for play and discovery.

items.name: Emma Prusch Farm Park Sensory Garden
items.short_description: Discover a unique sensory garden featuring diverse textures, including dedicated sand areas that offer a tactile 'mini-desert' experience.

items.name: AC Hotel San Jose Downtown Rooftop Bar
items.short_description: Sip cocktails and enjoy panoramic views of downtown San Jose's skyline from this modern and chic rooftop bar.

items.name: The Continental Bar Lounge & Patio
items.short_description: Discover a lively atmosphere with a great outdoor patio offering urban views, perfect for evening drinks and conversation.

items.name: Level 17 Rooftop at Hilton San Jose
items.short_description: Elevate your evening with sophisticated drinks and stunning views of the surrounding city from this elegant hotel rooftop.

items.name: The GlassHouse Event Venue Rooftop
items.short_description: While primarily an event venue, its rooftop offers unique perspectives of the downtown core during special events and gatherings.

items.name: San Jose Museum of Art Sculpture Garden
items.short_description: Discover a tranquil outdoor oasis featuring contemporary sculptures and lush greenery, a serene escape hidden amidst urban art.

items.name: Hotel De Anza Courtyard
items.short_description: Step into the elegant, historic courtyard of this Art Deco hotel, a charming and quiet spot perfect for a peaceful moment.

items.name: Japantown's Issei Memorial Building Courtyard
items.short_description: Find a quiet, traditional Japanese-style courtyard tucked away within Japantown, offering a moment of calm and cultural reflection.

items.name: SoFA District Art Alleys
items.short_description: Wander through colorful alleys adorned with vibrant street art and murals, revealing hidden artistic expressions in the heart of downtown.

items.name: The Tech Interactive
items.short_description: Explore a world of innovation with hands-on science and technology exhibits, an engaging and immersive learning experience for all ages.

items.name: San Jose City Hall Rotunda
items.short_description: Admire the impressive architecture and grand scale of the City Hall's rotunda, a significant public space and architectural marvel.

items.name: Vietnamese Heritage Garden
items.short_description: Wander through a vibrant garden celebrating Vietnamese culture and history, featuring traditional elements and community artwork.

items.name: California Theatre
items.short_description: Step inside this beautifully restored historic theater, an opulent landmark showcasing stunning Art Deco and Spanish Colonial Revival architecture.

items.name: San Jose Municipal Rose Garden
items.short_description: Breathe in the fragrance of thousands of blooming roses in this award-winning garden, a true botanical masterpiece.
items.location_hint: Rose Garden Neighborhood, West San Jose

items.name: Japanese Friendship Garden
items.short_description: Find serenity in this traditional Japanese garden, featuring koi ponds, waterfalls, and meticulously manicured landscapes.

items.name: Emma Prusch Farm Park Gardens
items.short_description: Explore diverse gardens, community plots, and an heirloom orchard, showcasing a variety of seasonal flora in a working farm setting.

items.name: Silver Creek Linear Park Wildflowers
items.short_description: Discover picturesque wildflower displays and native plant habitats along the trails, especially vibrant during spring blooms.

items.name: Sierra Road Overlook
items.short_description: Ascend to this iconic overlook for breathtaking panoramic views of the entire Santa Clara Valley, especially stunning at sunset.

items.name: Guadalupe River Park Pedestrian Bridges
items.short_description: Stroll across charming pedestrian bridges offering scenic views of the Guadalupe River, perfect for a leisurely walk or bike ride.

items.name: Alum Rock Park Overlooks
items.short_description: Discover various viewpoints within San Jose's oldest municipal park, offering serene nature views and glimpses of the valley below.

items.name: VTA Light Rail Bridge (South First Street)
items.short_description: An architecturally interesting light rail bridge in downtown, offering a dynamic urban backdrop, especially striking at night with passing trains.

items.name: San Jose City Hall
items.short_description: Marvel at the distinctive contemporary design of City Hall, featuring an iconic glass rotunda that dominates the downtown skyline.

items.name: Adobe Towers
items.short_description: Witness the sleek, modern glass towers of Adobe's headquarters, a prominent feature of San Jose's high-tech urban landscape.

items.name: The 88 Condominiums
items.short_description: Observe this striking residential skyscraper, a prime example of modern high-rise living and contemporary urban design in San Jose.
